description:
If you look at nova/cmd/spicehtml5proxy.py, we use 6082 port for Spice proxy.

In nova.conf, the default port for html5proxy_base_url is 6080 which fails console service.
title: Wrong proxy port in nova.conf for Spice

comments.content:
If you look at nova/cmd/spicehtml5proxy.py, we use 6082 port for Spice proxy.

In nova.conf, the default port for html5proxy_base_url is 6080 which fails console service.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~emilienm

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/27524
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/27524
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/0db9ba5ce33d6ed132d09d8398555f7c540dc7b3
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0db9ba5ce33d6ed132d09d8398555f7c540dc7b3
Author: Émilien Macchi <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Apr 26 01:20:05 2013 +0200

    Wrong proxy port in nova.conf for Spice proxy
    
    If we look at nova/cmd/spicehtml5proxy.py, we use 6082 port for Spice proxy.
    
    In nova.conf, the default port for html5proxy_base_url is 6080 which fails console
    service.
    
    Fix bug #1172957
    
    Change-Id: I52ca37f76e7a6abd085b079ae42e7914cb619ad5
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

    Wrong proxy port in nova.conf for Spice proxy
    
    If we look at nova/cmd/spicehtml5proxy.py, we use 6082 port for Spice proxy.
    
    In nova.conf, the default port for html5proxy_base_url is 6080 which fails console
    service.
    
    Fix bug #1172957
    Cherry-picked from https://review.openstack.org/#/c/27524/
